Pre-Game Insights: Babar Azam will lead Pakistan in the series after being reinstated as white-ball captain.
Michael Bracewell will captain New Zealand, as several senior players are unavailable due to IPL commitments.
Mohammad Amir and Imad Wasim return to international cricket after previously announcing their retirements.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The series marks New Zealand's third visit to Pakistan within the past 17 months.
The first match will take place at Rawalpindi Cricket Stadium on April 18, with the remaining matches scheduled for Rawalpindi and Lahore.
Others: Pakistan vs New Zealand, T20 series schedule:
First T20I: April 18, 2024 at Rawalpindi Cricket Stadium, Rawalpindi; 07:30 pm IST/02:00 pm GMT/07:00 pm LOCAL
Second T20I: April 20, 2024 at Rawalpindi Cricket Stadium, Rawalpindi; 07:30 pm IST/02:00 pm GMT/07:00 pm LOCAL
Third T20I: April 21, 2024 at Rawalpindi Cricket Stadium, Rawalpindi; 07:30 pm IST/02:00 pm GMT/07:00 pm LOCAL
Fourth T20I: April 25, 2024 at Gaddafi Stadium, Lahore; 07:30 pm IST/02:00 pm GMT/07:00 pm LOCAL
Fifth T20I: April 27, 2024 at Gaddafi Stadium, Lahore; 07:30 pm IST/02:00 pm GMT/07:00 pm LOCAL
